msbt.message: Dear person I don't know,
To whoever found this!
To the lucky duck who found this!
Congrats on finding my treasure!
YAY! You found it!
I thought of this DIY recipe while I was letting loose during dance practice!
I was re-reading my old notes on how to become a pop star and found this fab recipe!
I really wanted to make an item as, like, an homage to my fave pop star and came up with this recipe!
I was le relaxing yesterday while reading comics when I thought of this recipe!
You know how you get soooo bored during commercials? That's when I came up with this recipe!
I wanted to share it with someone, so I threw it in this bottle!
I put it in this bottle, so def check out my masterpiece!
I put it in this bottle, so check it out. This recipe is for sure a hit!
It's too good to keep to myself, so I threw it in this bottle to share!
I'll share it with you since you found this bottle!
Go get your arts and crafts on!
Show it off once you're done!
You'll totes love it too!
You'll want to use it ALL the time.
You have to HAVE to make it!
The cutest artisan,
From , a Creative
â€“, Master Crafter
The DIY Pop Star,
Sparkle on,

My style is legit always on my mind. I'm always asking: am I operating at peak me? So here's a special recipe that'll let you look however you want, whenever you want! Use this to glitz up your style!
